= Storage API =

This page acts as a hub for API topics related to using external storage with dotNetRDF.

You should start by reading the [[UserGuide/Triple Store Integration|Triple Store Integration]] page to get an overview of the APIs used to interact with external storage.

After that you can browse the following topics to learn more:

* [[UserGuide/Storage/Providers|Storage Providers]]
* [[UserGuide/Storage/Servers|Servers API]]
* [[UserGuide/Storage/Transactions|Transactions API]]
